channel.title: Magic World
channel.description: Try it one more time in the Magic World is the only way to make wounderful thing. And it is the same thing about life. Simplicity is most complexity. Think more, Talk less, and Try it one more time. Welcome to my Magic World

item.title: Greetings
item.description:
For years, I have beeing searhing a very simple and easy to use blog system for myself. Now I owned this. Thanks to Jekll and GithubThis is my first post using Jekll.

I would like to thank some experts to help me on this Topics 阮一峰 and Dylan Although we did not each other on the real world. But I learned very useful thing from him. This is the Magic of Internet and Computer. Thanks.

This blog is aimed to share my personal life and any technology topics related. Hope you will enjoy it. :)

Topics:

  • Technology
  • Literature
  • Music
